title: Qurbaan Hua
overview: A story of two individuals who belong to different cultures Hindu and Muslim respectively. This story revolves around love - hate concept where the male protagonist Neel, belong to Hindu family who wanted revenge for his beloved sister murdered and by his conceptual the murderer is Chahat's father. Chahat, the female protagonist belong to a Muslim family. Neel and Chahat both determined by their own statement to prove that their opinion is true and this ties them to stay in one roof by faking their marriage.
